holdsText:
Behind Sclimb are all active climbers with great passion for climbing and bouldering. We make fun, engaging, and affordable rock climbing holds for your climbing wall. 

  Our climbing holds are great for both kid climbers and adult climber.
volumesText:
Volumes are an excellent solution for giving depth to flat walls or extra technical features to custom walls. 

 With several different shapes and even more sizes to choose from. Sclimb's volumes can accommodate any space or budget. 

Sclimb's volumes will provide excitement for climbers of any skill level.
solutionsSubtitle: When you think about climbing walls,think about us!, we provide a full range of climbing solutions, products and services.
punchNote: *Punch passes can be shared between guests.
annualPrepaidNote1: *Prepaid memberships are valid from the day purchased and have no initiation fee. All members are entitled to freeze their membership for up to two months during a 12-month period
introSubtitle: We are climbers and actively support growing the climbing community.
